mma nntwuw m’enyim wɔ w’ebufuw mu: hu me mbɔbɔr; osiandɛ makyenkyen: Ao EWURADZE
Nkyii so mma nntsea me wɔ w’ebufuhyew m: sa me yarba; na me mbiew adwerew."

"Ao EWURADZE: "Me kra so ho yerɛw no dɛ: Ao

Nkyii so mma nntsea me wɔ w’ebufuhyew m: bɛgye me kra: Gye me nkwa wɔ w’adɔyɛ ntsi."

"Ao EWURADZE: "Na wo ho nkaa nnyi owu mu: Woana na obeyi ayɛw wɔ adakamona mu?"
"Maberɛ na m’apensi; Anadwe biara mema me mpa taa nsu mu; Medze me nyinsuwa fɔw me dabew."
"M’enyi yɛ monsoom wɔ awerɛhow ntsi; Ɔayɛ kusukusu wɔ m’atamfo nyinara ntsi."

mma nntwuw m’enyim wɔ w’ebufuw mu: hom mfi me nkyɛn mfi; Na EWURADZE atse mo sufrɛ."

"Ao EWURADZE: "EWURADZE atse mo nkotoserɛ; EWURADZE bɛgye me mpaayi."

mma nntwuw m’enyim wɔ w’ebufuw mu: na hɔn ho ahyehye hɔn dɛ: Wɔdze enyito bɛsan ekyir awerɛfir mu."
